scripts.build: echo 'No build step required for .mjs files'
scripts.package: zip -r stream-lambda-deployment.zip src/ package.json index.mjs node_modules/
scripts.deploy-lambda: aws lambda update-function-code --function-name MetadataSearchStack-DdbToAossFn1D7B7EB5-J2lIapkP13Ht --s3-bucket willa-lambda-code-567736086349 --s3-key stream-lambda-deployment.zip --profile willa-prod
scripts.deploy: npm run package && npm run deploy-s3 && npm run deploy-lambda
